Key reference to the application
The Protection Limit is used by products which have daily limits on the cumulative amount of transactions that can be done via an external channel.

By default a limit which is established applies to all transactions. Should a user wish to limit certain transactions while leaving others unrestricted they can do so by limiting the transactions based upon System Id, Application, Transaction Type, Currency and Beneficiary Risk.

These options are each multi-valued and aggregated with each other. For example should a user choose an 'Application' of Funds Transfer and a 'Beneficiary Risk' of High, then only transactions initiated via Funds Transfer, to a high-risk beneficiary will have the limit applied.
